dcterms:description: A simple instructional language generated for the GridWorld environment, built around three language elements (order connectors) defining the order of execution: one linear – 'comma' and two non-linear – 'but first', 'but before'.
dcterms:title: GridWorld

dcterms:creator: Maxime Chevalier-Boisvert
Dzmitry Bahdanau
Salem Lahlou
Lucas Willems
Chitwan Saharia
Thien Huu Nguyen
Yoshua Bengio
dcterms:description: A dataset aimed at grounded language learning with a human in the loop, focusing on the interaction between language and visual tasks.
dcterms:title: BabyAI

dcterms:creator: M. Kempka
M. Wydmuch
G. Runc
J. Toczek
W. Jakowski
dcterms:description: A Doom-based AI research platform designed for visual reinforcement learning, providing a rich environment for training and evaluating AI agents.
dcterms:title: VizDoom

dcterms:description: Language subsets generated for the experiments, focusing on different types of order connectors in instructions.
dcterms:title: Language Subsets (Comma, Comma-ButFirst, Comma-ButBefore)
